thread.title: Crawford Electric Supply Named Gold Distributor of Toshiba Uninterruptible Power Systems
thread.title_full: Crawford Electric Supply Named Gold Distributor of Toshiba Uninterruptible Power Systems

author: Travis Coggin
title: Crawford Electric Supply Named Gold Distributor of Toshiba Uninterruptible Power Systems
text:
Toshiba International Corporation (TIC) today announced the addition of Crawford Electric Supply to the expansive network of Toshiba Uninterruptible Power Systems (UPS) distributors. Crawford joins the growing list of Toshiba UPS Gold Tier distributors who are qualified to offer the latest in Toshiba power protection products. “Crawford Electric is fully equipped to deliver the latest Toshiba UPS products through their vast network,” said Greg Mack, Vice President and General Manager of Toshiba’s Power Electronics Division.
Toshiba UPS products now available through Crawford Electric include uninterruptible power systems, battery cabinets, flooded batteries, tie cabinets, input/output switchgear, power distribution units (PDUs), and monitoring software. As a Gold Tier distributor, Crawford Electric offers the latest in Toshiba UPS technology such as the three-phase 4400 Series UPS and single-phase 1600XPi Series UPS. The reliability and efficiency of Toshiba UPS products provide uninterrupted power and power quality solutions to data centers, healthcare, retail, telecommunications markets and more.
In 1990, Crawford Electric Supply opened its first store in Dallas, Texas and began a tradition of excellence. Within five years of opening, the store was ranked first in the twin city market. Crawford Electric grew from one store with $2 million in sales and six employees to $320 million in sales with six locations in Texas (Dallas, Houston, Austin, San Antonio, Fort Worth, and College Station). Each location rose to the top of their respective markets within a matter of years. Today, Crawford Electric sales are more than $750 million and the company has 30 locations and growing. Over the last 25 years, Crawford Electric has lived up to, and exceeded, its motto of "Whatever it Takes!"
About Toshiba International Corporation
TIC is a Toshiba America Inc. (TAI) Group Company, a wholly owned subsidiary of Toshiba Corporation. TIC is headquartered in Houston, Texas and employs approximately 2,000 people. TIC provides application solutions to a wide range of industries including industrial, power systems, and transmission and distribution systems. For more information about TIC, please visit http://www.toshiba.com/tic .
About the TIC Power Electronics Division
The TIC Power Electronics division has more than 28 years of experience in uninterruptible power systems. Toshiba produces a versatile range of single-phase and three-phase UPS solutions and accessories hallmarked for outstanding performance and reliability. Single-phase models range from 1 to 22kVA, while three-phase single module systems range from 15 to 1,000kVA, and three-phase parallel module systems from 100 to 8,000kVA. These systems are suitable for a wide range of applications including data centers, telecommunication, retail, healthcare, broadcasting, and industrial.
For more information please visit http://www.toshibaups.com .
